lead_paragraph: Jamie Sale and David Pelletier became parents over the weekend. Sale gave birth to her son Jesse on Sunday in St. Albert, Alberta. Jesse weighed in at 7 pounds. Sale and Pelletier won pairs gold amid scandal at the 2002 Winter Olympics.
